/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a variety of colors, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. Trees line the sidewalks, providing a touch of greenery amidst the concrete structures. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, indicating a well-organized traffic system. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of scale to the scene.
